column1: #Text=Unalaq says : " Let 's open this portal and lead your father and the entire Southern Water Tribe in the right direction .
#Text=" Korra says : " So , what exactly were you and my dad talking about ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Nothing , he was just worried about you , that 's all .
#Text=" Korra says : " Y' know , sometimes I wonder whose side you 're on .
#Text=" Mako says : " There are n't any sides .
#Text=We all just want to help however we can .
#Text=You have to trust that we 're here for you .
